markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Malignant Sustenance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1847)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Void" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=510" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 380 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=97)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing undead creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You embed a seed of void energy in an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature, restoring its unnatural vigor over time. The target gains [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 7.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The fast healing increases by 2.
name: Malignant Sustenance
